section.name: ISmicro Commons Proximity
section.p: Proximity Core component is a proxy-like pure Java application.

The Core is just a bunch of beans, with dependencies for only the needed transport and storage. Core dependencies are: commons-codec, commons-collections, commons-httpclient and commons-logging (needed by previous components and by Core itself). For detailed deps look here: maven deps report. NOTE: The spring-* deps are needed for integration tests only!

subsection.name: Project reports
subsection.p: Navigate with links on the left to examine current project status, various project reports and latest changes.
